mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Nottingham, George W.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Wood Co., W VA [Wood County, West Virginia]
Lubeck, Wood Co., W VA [Lubeck, Wood County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Nottingham, George W. Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of left shoulder. Ball entered 1/2 inch from axillary border of scapula 2 and 1/2 inches below the spine of scapula. Passed horizontally forward to exit through lower border of pectoralis major two inches from [illegible] in humerus. Gun shot flesh wound of back right side. Ball entrence 1/2 inch externally to [two words illegible] out the inter border of [illegible]. Location Wounded: Near Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/24. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet, Revolver. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nottingham, George W.
